verses.text: \w Finally|strong="G3063"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. To \w write|strong="G1125"\w* the same \w things|strong="G0846"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, to \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w grievous|strong="G3636"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* for \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \add it is\add* \w safe|strong="G0804"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="G0991"\w* of \w dogs|strong="G2965"\w*, \w beware|strong="G0991"\w* \w of|strong="G2040"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w workers|strong="G2040"\w*, \w beware|strong="G0991"\w* of the \w concision|strong="G2699"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, which \w worship|strong="G3000"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G3982"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w Though|strong="G2539"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w might|strong="G2192"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w confidence|strong="G4006"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w thinketh|strong="G1380"\w* that he hath whereof he might \w trust|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w*:

\w Circumcised|strong="G4061"\w* the eighth \w day|strong="G3637"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w stock|strong="G1085"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \add of\add* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="G0958"\w*, an \w Hebrew|strong="G1445"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Hebrews|strong="G1445"\w*; as \w touching|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, a \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*;

\w Concerning|strong="G2596"\w* \w zeal|strong="G2205"\w*, \w persecuting|strong="G1377"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*; \w touching|strong="G2596"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w blameless|strong="G0273"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* what \w things|strong="G3748"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w gain|strong="G2771"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w those|strong="G5023"\w* I \w counted|strong="G2233"\w* \w loss|strong="G2209"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G0235"\w* \w doubtless|strong="G3304"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w count|strong="G2233"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \add but\add* \w loss|strong="G2209"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w excellency|strong="G5242"\w* of the \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have suffered the loss \w of|strong="G2210"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* do \w count|strong="G2233"\w* them \add but\add* \w dung|strong="G4657"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may \w win|strong="G2770"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* mine \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* that which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* I may \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G0386"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* \w of|strong="G3804"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w*, being made conformable \w unto|strong="G4833"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*;
\w If|strong="G1487"\w* by any \w means|strong="G4459"\w* I might \w attain|strong="G2658"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G1815"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* as \w though|strong="G3754"\w* I \w had|strong="G2983"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w attained|strong="G2983"\w*, \w either|strong="G2228"\w* \w were|strong="G5048"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* I follow \w after|strong="G1377"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w that|strong="G2532"\w* I may \w apprehend|strong="G2638"\w* that \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* I am \w apprehended|strong="G2638"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w count|strong="G3049"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* to have \w apprehended|strong="G2638"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \add this\add* one \w thing|strong="G1520"\w* \add I do\add*, \w forgetting|strong="G1950"\w* those things which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w behind|strong="G3694"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* reaching \w forth|strong="G1901"\w* unto those things which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w*,

I \w press|strong="G1377"\w* \w toward|strong="G2596"\w* the \w mark|strong="G4649"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w prize|strong="G1017"\w* of \w the|strong="G2821"\w* \w high|strong="G0507"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="G5426"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* be \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w*, be \w thus|strong="G5124"\w* \w minded|strong="G5426"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* in any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* ye \w be|strong="G5426"\w* \w otherwise|strong="G2088"\w* \w minded|strong="G5426"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w reveal|strong="G0601"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G4133"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w to|strong="G1519"\w* we have already \w attained|strong="G5348"\w*, let us \w walk|strong="G4748"\w* by \w the|strong="G2583"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w rule|strong="G2583"\w*, let us \w mind|strong="G5426"\w* the same \w thing|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w be|strong="G1096"\w* followers \w together|strong="G4831"\w* of \w me|strong="G3450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mark|strong="G4648"\w* them which \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* so \w as|strong="G3779"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w for|strong="G2531"\w* an \w ensample|strong="G5179"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*, of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* tell \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w*, \add that they are\add* the \w enemies|strong="G2190"\w* of the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w* \add is\add* \w destruction|strong="G0684"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is their\add* \w belly|strong="G2836"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add whose\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \add is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w shame|strong="G0152"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w* earthly \w things|strong="G1919"\w*.)

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w conversation|strong="G4175"\w* \w is|strong="G5225"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w whence|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* we \w look|strong="G0553"\w* for the \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*, the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w change|strong="G3345"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w vile|strong="G5014"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* fashioned like \w unto|strong="G4832"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w working|strong="G1753"\w* \w whereby|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* is \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* to \w subdue|strong="G5293"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* unto \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.
